titleStmt.title: To the King's most Excellent Majesty: on his happie and miraculous return to the government of his three (now) flourishing kingdoms.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Clement, 1630-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by James Cottrel, for Humphry Robinson, at the three Pigeons in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Cl. Ellis = Clement Ellis.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 11 1660", "The gift of ye author, my son George's tutor".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
